description: Arthroscopic procedure for hip joint debridement and chondroplasty (Evidence: pg no: 1, L12-L14)
scope: Treatment of hip conditions excluding osteoarthritis (Evidence: pg no: 1, L12-L14)

documentation: Failure of conservative management for at least 3 months (Evidence: pg no: 1, L2-L3)
Avoidance of hip stretching or activities that elicit symptoms (Evidence: pg no: 1, L2-L3)
No evidence of advanced osteoarthritis, defined as Tönnis grade 2 or greater (Evidence: pg no: 1, L4-L5)
No evidence of severe chondral damage (Outerbridge grade IV) (Evidence: pg no: 1, L6)

exclusions: When done solely for treatment of hip osteoarthritis (Kellgren-Lawrence grade 2 or greater, Tönnis grade 2 or greater) (Evidence: pg no: 1, L13-L14)
Arthroscopic lavage and debridement for advanced osteoarthritis of the hip joint (Evidence: pg no: 1, L8)
notes: Part of FAIS surgery exclusions (Evidence: pg no: 1, L10-L25)
